language
in Portuguese

in English of course good morning
I begin my speech in English
excellencies We Are Young imperfect and
vibrant democracy and Oasis Of Peace
taller sin tolerance and freedom since
our independency in 2002 our democracy
has evolved it is alive and dynamic
The Economist Magazine's democracy index
rates timor-lest
as the most democratic country in
Southeast Asia the reporters Without
Borders organization in their more most
recent World Press Freedom index places
to more lasting the 10th Global position
in freedom of the press
we are a multicultural multi-religious
multilingual and multi-ethnic Society
with humility we continue to build a
country that is open to the world
tolerant free of hate and violence a 98
majority of practicing Catholics live in
harmony with our Protestant and Muslim
brothers and sisters timor-less has no
political violence nor tensions or
crimes based on ethnicity or religion we
have no domestic organized crime nor
armed robberies despite a significant
reduction in poverty multi-dimensional
poverty remains high around
45.8 percent and even higher among
children
to bring our population out of extreme
poverty food insecurity neonatal
mortality rickets and child malnutrition
and to provide care for children and
their mothers are some of the challenges
that we are determined to directly
confront in the next five years for this
reason child malnutrition and access to
preschool education are two of our key
priorities in collaboration with UNICEF
our government plans to implement an
intersectorial early childhood
development policy in order to drive
investments in a child's initial years
and build a solid basis for social and
human capital we have a high and
unacceptable incidence of domestic
violence however U.N Union has
recognized that the more or less is

legal Frameworks and international
policies
including Cedar the convention on the
rights of persons with disabilities and
Security Council resolution 1325.
in order to promote gender equality and
women's empowerment we are an observer
state of at asean with the rights to
participate in all Summits of heads of
state and government as well as meetings
of ministers High authorities and
Technical staff
doing
the last 20 years since our independence
and in the 10 years since we formally
applied for asean membership most
economic and social indicators show
significant progress including in life
expectancy which was below 60 years in
20 2002 and is now reason to 70 years
reduce poverty and child mortality 21
doctors in 22 2002 and now more than
1200 in 2002 the capital had partial
power coverage while the rest of the
country did not have such privilege
currently power is available in
96.1 percent of our territory we are
very grateful for for the Asian leaders
unanimous decision to Grant Observer
status to Timur last a pathway to
membership and a broad support package
to continue to build our staff and
diplomats skills we do not depend on
foreign aid and we are
eternal grateful to those who helped us
when our needs were greatest we financed
our own National budget with the returns
from a certain Sovereign fund invested
in U.S treasury bonds and in Global
Financial markets with an annual return
in excess of nine percent the more less
is an active member of the community of

Group which was established in 2010 in
Delhi and is formed by 20 countries
affected by conflicts
the Ukraine and the resulting

disproportionately impacted the already

they have always felt the brand of every

of extreme hunger poverty and

people living in fragile circumstances

we can gain more from the free movement

we all benefit from the impressive
Indian transformation into a global

equally we want to see prosperity in

but their continuing Prosperity depends

South depends on our markets Workforce
and providers of our wealth which they

we have the chance of the century to

between the rich Super Rich of the north
